rules: Rule1: If the company hires production engineers, then either the manufacturing plant begins prototype production or the manufacturing plant delays prototype production
Rule2: If the company violates environmental laws regulations, then the company loses sustainability standard certification
Rule3: If the company violates environmental laws regulations, then the company does not get penalties from regulatory agencies
Rule4: Either the company implements environmental protocols compliance or the company appeals decisions with regulatory agencies
Rule5: If the company appeals decisions with regulatory agencies, then the company does not violate environmental laws regulations
Rule6: If the company has an ethics committee, then when the company implements environmental protocols compliance, the company receives fines from regulatory agencies
Rule7: If the manufacturing plant uses hazardous processes, then the manufacturing plant causes pollution in the local ecosystem
Rule8: If the manufacturing plant uses hazardous processes, then the manufacturing plant installs filters in the emission system
Rule9: If the company loses sustainability standard certification, then the company gets penalties from regulatory agencies
Rule10: If the company maintains quality control standards, then the company follows manufacturing guidelines protocols
Rule11: If the company follows manufacturing guidelines protocols, then when the company passes inspections by regulatory agencies, the company does not gain approval from regulatory agencies

Rule13: Either the company acquires rare materials or the company finds substitute alternative materials
Rule14: If the manufacturing plant begins prototype production, then the engineering team approves alternative materials

Rule15: If the manufacturing plant delays prototype production, then either the company completes research on material properties or if the company finds substitute alternative materials, then the company achieves sustainability in manufacturing processes
Rule16: If the company hires material scientists, then either the manufacturing plant begins prototype production or the manufacturing plant delays prototype production
Rule17: Either the company hires material scientists or the company hires production engineers
Rule18: If it is not the case that either the company has government grant funding or the company achieves sustainability in manufacturing processes, then the company develops a prototype

Rule19: If it is not the case that either the company receives fines from regulatory agencies or the company does not violate environmental laws regulations, then the company gains approval from regulatory agencies

Rule20: If it is not the case that either the company receives fines from regulatory agencies or the company does not violate environmental laws regulations, then the company passes inspections by regulatory agencies

Rule21: If it is not the case that if the manufacturing plant installs filters in the emission system then the manufacturing plant does not cause pollution in the local ecosystem, then the company faces lawsuits from environmental groups
Rule22: If the company does not achieve sustainability in manufacturing processes, then the company violates environmental laws regulations
Rule23: If the company does not achieve sustainability in manufacturing processes, then the manufacturing plant uses hazardous processes
